question: The "Banda Sea" is located in which ocean?
explanation: The Banda Sea is located in the south-western Pacific Ocean in the East Indian Archipelago. This sea is bordered by the Molucca Sea and the Ceram Sea to the north and Timor Island to the south. The Banda Sea is located in the centre of Maluku Islands. The Banda Sea is a marine ecoregion, as defined by the World Wildlife Fund. It is part of the Coral Triangle region which has the greatest diversity of coral reef species in the broader Indo-Pacific.
